conclusion: Determine which blocks A will collide with and its final stop position.
A is entering from the lower right, moving towards the group of blocks.
The first block A might encounter is the red block closest to its path.
After colliding with the red block, A might deflect towards the nearby yellow block.
A hits the red block and will likely push the red block slightly.
After the collision, A might change direction slightly due to the impact, moving towards the yellow block.
A collides with the yellow block and the impact might slow A down significantly.
